reviewText: CAUTION HERE!  This dvd is a REGION #2 PAL and NOT a Region #1 US/Canada as stated in description so understand this before purchasing

I ordered this product three times and had to return each one.  The video rolls continuously and cannot be viewed.  I don't know what the problem is, but it looks like the vertical hold is off.  I have just returned the third video and I am tired of trying.  I guess I'll do without.
Very sincerely,
Pam
The video quality was excellent, the songs were awesome, it was great to sit down and just watch Rick Astley sing.  The videos were very entertaining.
